desc: This transformation will find some keywords in sentences and replace them with their antonym.

ori.premise: A couple is eating outside at a table and he is pointing at something.
ori.hypothesis: People are eating at a table outside.
ori.label: entailment

trans.premise: A couple is eating outside at a table and he is pointing at something.
trans.hypothesis: A couple is eating inside at a table and he is pointing at something.
trans.label: contradiction

ori.premise: A woman within an orchestra is playing a violin.
ori.hypothesis: A woman is playing the violin.
ori.label: entailment

trans.premise: A woman within an orchestra is playing a violin.
trans.hypothesis: A man within an orchestra is playing a violin.
trans.label: contradiction
